```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(here)
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)

ndata <- read_xlsx(
  here("in", "NC BASE DE DATOS_CALEND_EPISODES_FOR_SHEDDING_LEYENDA.xlsx"),
  sheet = "calend")

nshed <- read_xlsx(
  here("in", "NC BASE DE DATOS_CALEND_EPISODES_FOR_SHEDDING_LEYENDA.xlsx"),
  sheet = "episodes_for_shedding")
```

## Introducción

El estudio XYZ siguió a `r ndata$codigo %>% unique %>% length` niños `r ndata %>% group_by(codigo) %>% summarise(inicio = min(edadmeses), fin = max(edadmeses)) %>% summarise(inicio = min(inicio), fin = max(fin))`
